divs: sighting detailsi was watching the stars at night on my deck with my boyfriend, and saw this one bright object in the sky; yellow in color, and itwas moving about 1 1\2 inches in circumference of the object. and it radiated a brightbeam oflight which was noted once i got out my binoculars. and you couldsee the beam of light move when the object was movng. we watched it for about 10 minutes. probably isstil there, bu it is cold. maybe its a satelliete, but i did not think that they move that much. i a incalifornia, county is san bernardino, i was not able to click that in the box that is there.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Crestline
There were no other sightings in Crestline on or around May 9th 2009
Summary: Upon watching the stars, me and my boyfriend saw strange object that moved and appeared to be a very bright star but yellow in color.
